seo.title: Digital Signage for Internal Communications
seo.description: Brighten your offices and lobbies and deliver the information and content your team needs with digital signage powered by Broadsign.

Hero.Blurb: Enhance internal communications with a digital signage solution that enables creative messaging and compelling visuals that make people take notice.

Pane1.Title: Boost Morale
Pane1.Paragraph: Celebrate wins both big and small across an internal network to drive greater productivity and workplace satisfaction.

Pane2.Title: News your Team Needs
Pane2.Paragraph: Keep an organization's fingers on the pulse with up-to-the-minute industry content delivery drawn from social media or RSS feeds.

Pane3.Title: Data for all
Pane3.Paragraph: Increase transparency and improve team confidence in their organization by sharing key organizational data across the internal network of screens.

Pane4.Title: Local Messaging Made Simple
Pane4.Paragraph: Quickly get out messaging for corporate functions, special events, or emergencies with a template-based tool enabling easier local messaging on your network's screens.

cards.title: Flexible options for maximum ad sales
cards.par: With specialized tools for both direct and programmatic sales teams, exceed sales targets and reach new buyers.
cards.direct: Empower your team with Campaign Planning
cards.reach: Sell programmatically with our Programmatic SSP

SpielPosterVisitor.title: Show visitors the way
SpielPosterVisitor.text: Take the guesswork out of navigating a large office or complex with wayfinding screens that provide personalized directions.

Quoteblock.Quote: We really like that Broadsign's rules-based. You never touch the schedule, you just put circulation conditions and boom, the engine does the work. That really was a milestone for us..
